p: The reductions of agricultural land and fertilizers cause a decrease of nutrient loads to the Ria de Aveiro (BAU, CRI, MH, and SET scenarios) and Vistula Lagoon (CRI and SET scenarios). In addition, the decrease of point sources assumed for all scenarios, except the CRI scenario in Ria de Aveiro also contributes to these trends. The observed impacts are further intensified under climate change, although the climate scenarios suggest a dryer climate for the Ria de Aveiro catchment only.
